body.name: CeraVe Anti Itch Moisturizing Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Relieves Itch with Minor Skin Irritations, Sunburn Relief, Bug Bites | 8 Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE pickup February 26 - 29 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [ CERAVE ANTI ITCH LOTION ] Temporarily relieves itching associated with insect bites, sunburn, poison ivy while moisturizing dry skin. Lightweight texture that is absorbed quickly for softened skin with non-greasy feel.

[ CLINICALLY TESTED ] Provides relief within two minutes and lasts up to 8 hours. 100 percent of people experienced relief for even their most severe itch; clinical study done on 34 subjects. Individual results may vary.

[ SOOTHING INGREDIENTS ] Formulated with 1% Pramoxine Hydrochloride for fast-acting, long-lasting temporary itch-relief, Niacinamide to help calm skin, and Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] Suitable for use on face; body; and hands to temporarily relieve itching. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free; steroid-free; and non-comedogenic. FSA Eligible & HSA Eligible
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion temporarily relieves itching associated with minor skin irritations, insect bites and sunburn. Formulated with the anti-itch ingredient, Pramoxine Hydrochloride 1%, this product provides fast-acting, long lasting temporary itch relief. This itch relief lotion also contains three essential ceramides that helps repair and restore the skin’s barrier all in an emollient-based cream with a light-weight, velvety texture. Steroid-free Fragrance-free Non-comedogenic Sulfate-free Gentle, non-irritating formula Accepted by the National Eczema Association Key Ingredients: 1% Pramoxine Hydrochloride: Provides fast-acting, long-lasting, temporary itch relief Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand Developed with dermatologists*, CeraVe has a complete line of therapeutic skincare to cleanse and moisturize skin. CeraVe contains the three essential ceramides (called 1, 3, and 6-II) skin needs. Delivered through a controlled-release technology, this formula with ceramides helps rebuild the skin's protective barrier and locks in moisture all day. *Confirmed by CeraVe 2019 Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion Product Technology Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion temporarily relieves itching associated with minor skin irritations, insect bites and sunburn. Formulated with the anti-itch ingredient, Pramoxine Hydrochloride 1%, this product provides fast-acting, long lasting temporary itch relief. This itch relief lotion also contains three essential ceramides that helps repair and restore the skin’s barrier all in an emollient-based cream with a light-weight, velvety texture. With ceramides 1, 3 and 6-II Pramoxine Hydrochloride for itch relief Steroid-free Fragrance-free Non-comedogenic Sulfate-free Gentle, non-irritating formula *Confirmed by CeraVe 2019

Product Features and Benefits How to Use Apply to affected area no more than 3 to 4 times daily. Clinically Tested 100% of people experienced relief for even their most severe itch.* *Clinical study of 34 subjects. Individual results may vary. Fast Acting 2 minutes until relief for most people* *Clinical study of 34 subjects. Individual results may vary. Long Lasting 8 hours of relief for most people* *Clinical study of 34 subjects. Individual results may vary.

The CeraVe Difference 3 Essential Ceramides All CeraVe products contain the vital ceramides skin needs to help restore and maintain its natural protective barrier. The Role of Ceramides Ceramides are an essential part of the skin's natural barrier. They hydrate all day to help restore the protective skin barrier. Developed with Dermatologists* CeraVe Itch Relief Moisturizing Cream temporarily relieves itch due to insect bites, sunburn and minor skin irritations. *Confirmed by CeraVe 2019 NEA Seal of Acceptance* The National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance* only accepts products that have satisfied the criteria for use for those with eczema or sensitive skin conditions. *Confirmed by CeraVe 2019

Hydrocotisone Anti-Itch Cream Healing Ointment Itch Relief Cream Creamy Oil Psoriasis Cream Itch Relief Lotion Used for Itch Relief Cracked and Chafed Skin; Dry Skin; Minor Cuts and Scrapes Itch Relief Body Moisturizer Body Moisturizer; Exfoliation Itch Relief Key Ingredient(s) Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; 1% Hydrocortisone Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Petrolatum; Hyaluronic Acid Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Pramoxine Hydrochloride Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Soothing Oils Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; 2% Salicylic Acid; Cotton & Meadowfoam Seed; Niacinamide; Lactic Acid Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Pramoxine Hydrochloride Benefit Moisturizes through the day. Helps restore the skins protective barrier. Temporarily protects and soothes cracked and chafed skin with a non-greasy feel. Fast acting, long lasting relief from itch and irritation. Moisturizes dry, itchy, irritated skin while ceramides help restore the skin barrier. Relieves and helps prevent recurrence of the symptoms of psoriasis. Fast acting, long lasting relief from itch and irritation.

Hydrating Body Wash Hydrocortisone Cream 1% Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion Hydrating Sheer Sunscreen Skin Type Dry Skin Extra dry, eczema-prone skin All Skin Types All Skin Types Benefit Cleanses and moisturizes while ceramides help restore the protective skin barrier Helps treat rashes due to extra dry skin and eczema flare ups Fast acting, long lasting relief from itch and irritation Hybrid face & body sunscreen to absorb and reflect the sun's damaging rays plus three essential ceramides to help restore skin’s natural barrier Texture Non-foaming, creamy texture Rich, creamy texture Lightweight lotion texture Lightweight, clear finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but works
reviews.reviewText: Sure it’s a bit pricey, but keeps my mom’s legs and feet moisturized and itch free. Purchase for years now, no complaints of the actual product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely good for itching.
reviews.reviewText: Works right after you apply it. Lasts all day. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does what it is spouse to do. Stops the itch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Be careful unlocking pump seems tighter than other brands of lotion I have used.
reviews.reviewText: Once I was able to get the pump to work lotion made a big difference soothing the itchiness of my dry skin. Really like the fact it is not scented like other brands I have used. Rated four stars since I have only used product four less than a week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Lotion for Dry Itchy Slin
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for a really good lotion for dry, itchy hands and lower arms and found it with this brand. Most of the others I tried, dried slowly or left a sticky feeling. This CeraVe dies fast and not a bit of stickiness and it takes care of the itching very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer at a Great price
reviews.reviewText: works as expected. Keeps the skin moisturized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes Me Itch
reviews.reviewText: I used this, but it made me itch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion really works to calm my dry, itchy winter skin. I noticed a difference within the first day.
Takes away itch immediately. Great cream
It works great to STOP the itch on my foot. I think it is a little expensive for the size.
Helps immediately and long term. No smell no grease. Definitely happy with this product. Good quality

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente crema y alivia la comezón casi de inmediato
reviews.reviewText: Es una muy buena crema si tienes comezón en algunos puntos del cuerpo. Sin embargo, es un poco cara.
This worked really well on my dry itchy skin. I have used it off and on for two weeks.
